show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

header.title: Reflections on Our Times and Wishes for the Future

title: Reflections on Our Times and Wishes for the Future
content: Listen to writer, poet, novelist, Susan Griffin, author of A Chorus of Stones in conversation with Alison Rose Levy, in... <!--more--> conversation about the challenges of our time and how we can regain wisdom and a firm footing on the earth.Â
